title: The 'Indrani' Polki Diamond & Emerald Jhumka Earrings
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and antique appeal.
features: These exquisite jhumkas showcase a classic temple design, meticulously handcrafted with intricate Polki settings. The floral motif at the top features a central Emerald stone, complemented by a halo of Polki diamonds. The jhumka bell is adorned with Polki diamonds in a Mughal-inspired pattern. Dangling freshwater pearls and emerald drops add movement and a touch of elegance.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. Adds a regal touch to any traditional attire
but can also be paired with Indo-Western outfits for a modern twist.
description: These jhumkas are a true embodiment of South Indian heritage, showcasing superior craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of uncut Polki diamonds, natural emeralds, and freshwater pearls speaks to the piece's authenticity and investment value. The antique Hyderabadi polish adds a unique charm, making it a treasured heirloom.
